name: Slime Ranger
description:
The Gameplay
Let's get some slimes!



With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door.
Sometimes the door will need keys.



You will need to attack! Every level you have a specific quantity of daggers to use in the slimes.



Be wise when you gonna strike!

Features:
♦ 4 Worlds with unique environments
♦ 35 hand-craft levels
♦ Difficulty progression for a growing challenge over the levels
♦ Beautiful pixel art
♦ A lot of slimes to slay!
